records.name: admin
records.description: Internal high-privileges role, used basically to inherited privileges for other custom adminstrative roles

records.name: reader
records.description: Internal low-privileges role, used basically to inherited privileges for other custom roles

records.name: writer
records.description: Internal medium-privileges role, used basically to inherited privileges for other custom roles

records.name: administrator
records.description: Administrative role, users belonging to this role are Gods

records.name: anonymous
records.description: Role used internally to access to the internal db with low privileges

records.name: registered
records.description: Default role for new registered users

records.name: backoffice
records.description: Preconfigured role to give users belonging to it the grants to access the contents generated by the registered users

records.name: friends_of_baasbox
records.description: These are friends of baasbox

records.name: friends_of_internal_admin
records.description: These are friends of internal_admin
Access to APIs for reading and for asset downloading.
Allows users to access their accounts, login and logout, modify their passwords.
Allows users to create new accounts (signup via username/password).
Allows login/signup through supported social networks.
Enables the workflow to reset a password via email.
Allows to query users' profiles.
Allows to know your followers or the people you follow on the social platform within BaasBox.
Enables the social functions of BaasBox: following/unfollowing among the users of the BaasBox server.
Allows registered users to send push notifications to other users. Administrators can always send notifications to users.

Allows apps to send device tokens they need in order to receive push notifications through BaasBox. If you disable these functions, apps wil no longer be able to register in order to receive push notifications from such server. Apps that are already registered will keep on receiving notifications.
Allows to create new Documents.
Allows to read Collections and Documents by querying them.
Allows to update the contents of already existing Documents.
Enables the possibility to modify the ACL of Documents.
Allows to download the Files stored in BaasBox and query them.
Allows to create new Files.
Enables the possibility to modify the ACL of Files.
Allows to make calls to plugins.
